short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users to easily insert search operators for advanced searching on Google.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Advanced Search" extension is a powerful and user-friendly tool that enhances your Google search experience. With this extension, you can effortlessly perform advanced searches using predefined queries and specialized operators. The extension provides a streamlined interface, allowing you to insert specific search parameters such as "user:", "post:", "location:", and "date:" directly into the search bar with the click of a button. Whether you're looking to refine your search results or perform complex queries, the "Advanced Search" extension simplifies the process, saving you time and providing you with more accurate and targeted search results. Take control of your search queries like never before with this convenient and intuitive extension.
